description: Create and edit data in Pipedrive

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create an activity

properties.name: Delete
properties.description: Delete an activity

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Get data of an activity

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Get data of many activities

properties.name: Update
properties.description: Update an activity

properties.name: Duplicate
properties.description: Duplicate a deal

properties.name: Search
properties.description: Search a deal

properties.name: Remove
properties.description: Remove a product from a deal

properties.name: Download
properties.description: Download a file

properties.name: subject
properties.description: The subject of the activity to create

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of the activity like "call", "meeting", etc

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: ID of the deal this activity will be associated with

properties.name: due_date
properties.description: Due Date to activity be done YYYY-MM-DD

properties.name: note
properties.description: Note of the activity (HTML format)

properties.name: org_id
properties.description: ID of the organization this activity will be associated with. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: person_id
properties.description: ID of the person this activity will be associated with

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: ID of the active user whom the activity will be assigned to. If omitted, the activity will be assigned to the authorized user. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: customProperties
properties.description: Adds a custom property to set also values which have not been predefined

properties.name: value
properties.description: Value of the property to set

properties.name: activityId
properties.description: ID of the activity to delete

properties.name: updateFields
properties.description: Whether the user is set to busy during the activity

properties.name: deal_id
properties.description: ID of the deal this activity will be associated with

properties.name: public_description
properties.description: Additional details about the activity that is synced to your external calendar

properties.name: title
properties.description: The title of the deal to create

properties.name: label
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: lost_reason
properties.description: Reason why the deal was lost

properties.name: probability
properties.description: Deal success probability percentage

properties.name: stage_id
properties.description: ID of the stage this deal will be placed in a pipeline. If omitted, the deal will be placed in the first stage of the default pipeline. (PIPELINE > STAGE). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: dealId
properties.description: ID of the deal to delete

properties.name: productId
properties.description: The ID of the product to add to a deal. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: item_price
properties.description: Price at which to add or update this product in a deal

properties.name: quantity
properties.description: How many items of this product to add/update in a deal

properties.name: discount_percentage
properties.description: Percentage of discount to apply

properties.name: product_variation_id
properties.description: ID of the product variation to use

properties.name: productAttachmentId
properties.description: ID of the deal-product (the ID of the product attached to the deal). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: exactMatch
properties.description: Whether only full exact matches against the given term are returned. It is not case sensitive.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: organizationId
properties.description: Will filter Deals by the provided Organization ID

properties.name: personId
properties.description: Will filter Deals by the provided Person ID

properties.name: product_id
properties.description: ID of the person this file will be associated with

properties.name: fileId
properties.description: ID of the file to delete

properties.name: description
properties.description: The updated description of the file

properties.name: organization_id
properties.description: ID of the organization to link to this lead

properties.name: label_ids
properties.description: ID of the labels to attach to the lead to create. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: owner_id
properties.description: ID of the user who will own the lead to create. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: leadId
properties.description: ID of the lead to delete

properties.name: expected_close_date
properties.description: Date when the leadâ€™s deal is expected to be closed, in ISO-8601 format

properties.name: content
properties.description: The content of the note to create

properties.name: lead_id
properties.description: ID of the lead this note will be associated with

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the organization to create

properties.name: rawData
properties.description: Whether to return the data exactly in the way it got received from the API

properties.name: email
properties.description: Email of the person

properties.name: phone
properties.description: Phone number of the person

properties.name: resolveProperties
properties.description: By default do custom properties get returned only as ID instead of their actual name. Also option fields contain only the ID instead of their actual value. If this option gets set they get automatically resolved.

properties.name: encodeProperties
properties.description: By default do custom properties have to be set as ID instead of their actual name. Also option fields have to be set as ID instead of their actual value. If this option gets set they get automatically encoded.

properties.name: exclude
properties.description: A comma-separated Activity IDs, to exclude from result. Ex. 4, 9, 11, ...

properties.name: filterId
properties.description: ID of the filter to use. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: firstChar
properties.description: If supplied, only persons whose name starts with the specified letter will be returned

properties.name: sort
properties.description: The field names and sorting mode separated by a comma (field_name_1 ASC, field_name_2 DESC). Only first-level field keys are supported (no nested keys).

properties.name: term
properties.description: The search term to look for. Minimum 2 characters (or 1 if using exact_match).

properties.name: includeFields
properties.description: Supports including optional fields in the results which are not provided by default

properties.name: end_date
properties.description: Use the Activity due date where you wish to stop fetching Activities from. Insert due date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

properties.name: start_date
properties.description: Use the Activity due date where you wish to begin fetching Activities from. Insert due date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
